commits.content:
# Yoga-quiz app ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸

Quick yoga quiz about the names of asanas in Sanskrit

## Installation

Install yoga-quiz app with npm

```bash
  npm install yoga-quiz-app
  cd yyoga-quiz-app
```

## Tech Stack

JS, React with hooks (useState, useContext, useReducer), Ant design

## Screenshots

![App Screenshot](src/img/welcome.png)
![App Screenshot](src/img/question.png)
![App Screenshot](src/img/result.png)

## Features

-user has to enter his name to start quiz ğŸ‘©ğŸ¼â€ğŸ’»

-user gets 5 random questions (picture of yoga pose) and has to choose correct sanscrit name ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸

-on the end of quiz user gets a result and can start new quiz ğŸ†
